name: HIV Clinic at Ward 86, UCSF
description: Established in 1983 as one of the first dedicated HIV clinics in the United States, the HIV Clinic at Ward 86 is located on the Zuckerberg San Francisco General Hospital (ZSFG) campus. Ward 86 became the first clinic in the world to recommend Universal Antiretroviral Treatment regardless of CD4 count.
